item.title: Up in the air: The vague Byju’s-NITI Aayog stab at public edtech
item.description: Note: This article was originally published on The Ken website and is subject to their copyright terms and conditions. Summary The $20 billion edtech giant Byju’s has set its sight on the public education system in India. It has a willing partner in NITI Aayog Byju’s wants to target students in India’s most developmentally challenged states; its products aren’t a great fit for the audience
